official_title: Urging the President to proclaim Sunday, December 15, 1991, as a National Day of Thanksgiving for the Bill of Rights and for the contributions of Patrick Henry to the Bill of Rights.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives urges the President to proclaim Sunday, December 15, 1991, as a day to offer thanksgiving for the Bill of Rights, and to honor that noble patriot and statesman, Patrick Henry, for his monumental effort to obtain these rights for all Americans.

titles.title: Urging the President to proclaim Sunday, December 15, 1991, as a National Day of Thanksgiving for the Bill of Rights and for the contributions of Patrick Henry to the Bill of Rights.
